Text: Andrićgrad (, meaning "Andrić's town") is the name of an ongoing construction project located in Višegrad, Bosnia and Herzegovina by director Emir Kusturica.
Triplets:<Andrićgrad
1:
--------------------
<Text: Andrićgrad:  The town is dedicated to Yugoslav novelist Ivo Andrić, Nobel prize winner.>
